Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION
REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Provides free use of state parks for certified first responders who participated in the rescue effort at the World Trade Center on September 11, 2001
Summary: Relates to providing free use of state parks for certified first responders who participated in the rescue effort at the World Trade Center on September 11, 2001.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Add ยง13.22, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to providing free use of state parks for certified first responders who participated in the rescue effort conducted in response to the World Trade Center attack on September 11, 2001
